title: Indexing of Subversion Repositories.
description:
It would be a big help if Lucene had the ability to index Subversion (or CVS, or whatever) repositories, including revision history.

Searches (beyond basic text of the source code) might include:

path:/branches/mybranch  Foo

history:Foo

comments.content:
Matt:
Lucene is a library/toolkit, not an application, so Lucene itself will probably never be able to do that, though it can be used by somebody to build an application for indexing SVN repositories.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic

comments.content:
You should try Fisheye!  It uses Lucene internally.
